synopsis.text: Oorai's spirited girls return in a series of special episodes, filled with summer fun, camaraderie, and their signature Tankery flair! From the thrill of picking out the perfect swimsuit to the excitement of a school trip to the beach, these girls know how to make the most of the season. Join them as they embark on a camping adventure, showcase their unique talents in a team contest, and even delve into the mysteries of the Oorai school ship. Don't miss out on the behind-the-scenes look at Yukari and Erwin's reconnaissance mission, revealing more than you might expect! Prepare for laughter, friendship, and unforgettable moments with the Oorai crew.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
